query: mutation($input: IssueCreateInput!) { issueCreate(input: $input) { success issue { id identifier } } }

input.title: E2E test only passing 7/8 checks - investigate missing pass
input.description:
## Issue

Automated E2E payment flow test passing 7/8 checks (87.5%). Should be 8/8 (100%).

## Test Results

✅ PASSING (7):
1. Create test user in database
2. Simulate registration data
3. Check payment service enabled
4. Create payment request
5. Payment stored in database
6. Payment invoice message sent
7. QR code sent

❓ MISSING (1):
8. Test RegistrationHandler payment flow - shows START but not counted in PASS total

## Expected Behavior

All 8 test steps should pass with 100% success rate.

## Current Behavior

Success Rate: 87.5% (7/8)
- Step 8 logged as START but not completing to PASS
- Payment flow works correctly despite test count discrepancy

## Investigation Needed

- Review test logging in tests/e2e-payment-flow.js
- Check if step 8 completion log missing
- Verify test counter logic

## File

tests/e2e-payment-flow.js
